changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: update catissue_specimen set collection_status = 'Missed Collection' where collection_status not in ('Collected', 'Pending')

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the Site's default insititute from coordinator
changeSet.sql: update catissue_site site join catissue_site_coordinators siteCrd on siteCrd.site_id = site.identifier join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = siteCrd.user_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = usr.department_id set site.institute_id = dep.institute_id

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the Site's default insititute from coordinator
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_site site using ( select site.identifier as site_id, dep.institute_id as inst_id from catissue_site site join catissue_site_coordinators siteCrd on siteCrd.site_id = site.identifier join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = siteCrd.user_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = usr.department_id ) t on (site.identifier = t.site_id) when matched then update set site.institute_id = t.inst_id

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the DP's default institute ID from the PI
changeSet.sql: update catissue_distribution_protocol dp join catissue_user u on u.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = u.department_id join catissue_institution inst on inst.identifier = dep.institute_id set dp.institute_id = inst.identifier

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the DP's default institute ID from the PI
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_distribution_protocol dp using ( select dp.identifier as dp_id, dep.institute_id as inst_id from catissue_distribution_protocol dp join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id join os_departments dep on dep.identifier = usr.department_id ) t on (dp.identifier = t.dp_id) when matched then update set dp.institute_id = t.inst_id

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the requestor ID to PI if not specified
changeSet.sql: update catissue_order ordr join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on ordr.distribution_protocol_id = dp.identifier join catissue_user u on u.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id set ordr.requester_id = u.identifier where ordr.requester_id is null

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Update the requestor ID to PI if not specified
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_order ordr using ( select ordr.identifier as order_id, usr.identifier as user_id from catissue_order ordr join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on ordr.distribution_protocol_id = dp.identifier join catissue_user usr on usr.identifier = dp.principal_investigator_id ) t on (ordr.identifier = t.order_id) when matched then update set ordr.requester_id = t.order_id
